Name: General
Description: Core text correction, proofreading and rewriting.

Name: Change Tone
Description: Adjust the tone of your text to be formal, casual, or simpler.

Name: Change Length
Description: Expand or condense your text to meet specific needs.

Name: Change Structure
Description: Reformat your text into different structures like lists.

Name: Generate
Description: Generate new content, from continuing text to brainstorming ideas.

Name: Coding
Description: A suite of tools for explaining, debugging, and improving code.
